content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Hello Aziz, thank you for considering my apartment for rent. I'm confident that it will be a great fit for you. Before we discuss the rental price, may I ask what your budget is for renting an apartment in Mannheim? This will help me determine the best price for you.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: My budget is 300 euros per month. I am a student and I am looking for an apartment that is close to the university.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you for letting me know. Based on your budget and the location of the apartment, I would suggest a rental price of 350 euros per month. This price takes into account the cost of living in Mannheim and the location of the apartment. However, I am open to negotiating and finding a price that works for both of us. What do you think?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 350 euros per month. Thank you very much for your understanding. I will sign the contract as soon as possible.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Great, I'm glad to hear that you agree to the rental price. Once you sign the contract, I will provide you with the necessary documents and instructions to move into the apartment. I look forward to having you as my tenant and ensuring that you have a comfortable and enjoyable living experience in Mannheim.
name: Heinrich Heine
